nodes.text: A Tapani commitment band was a ring that was worn by married Tapani individuals to symbolize their commitment to their spouse. Following her marriage to Yaru Korsin, Seelah Korsin, wore a commitment band, on a finger which bore the Korsin family seal. Millennia later, in 2975 BBY, Iliana Hilts worse the same ring during her marriage with the new Grand Lord Varner Hilts in order to reconcile Seelah's contributions to the Lost Tribe of Sith.
